creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue, purple, green, pink; covers neck and ears with flaps; three dimensional; wired, stiff flower petals on purple, tan, orange and blue; gold fringe in center; top has fringed butterfly with metal springs; blue background edged in pink braid; mauve plaid lining; PR knotted ball button; silver paper edges
title: Child's Hat
